content.text: As the Lead Developer for Open Source Medical Supplies, I contributed to a global effort to provide life-saving resources during the COVID-19 pandemic. What started as a rag tag band of volunteers, led to a funded coalition undertaking the development of tools and platforms that connected citizens, manufacturers, and healthcare providers, ensuring reliable and efficient distribution of information.
Developed features for volunteers to share designs, manufacturing techniques, and distribution plans. Enhanced UI/UX to improve engagement and accessibility for a diverse, global audience.
